alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Palm Beach County through 800 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over Loxahatchee NWR, or 8 miles southwest of Wellington, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Boca Raton, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Palm Springs, Atlantis, Haverhill, Loxahatchee NWR, Village Of Golf, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, Whisper Walk, Lion Country Safari Park, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates and Kings Point. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
